MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety in the LL46 postcode areas of Harlech following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11PM on 26th December 2020
